uk.ac.glasgow.internman

Interface Advertisement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdvertisementImpl

    public interface Advertisement
extends java.io.Serializable
    This class represents an advertisement within the internship management system. An advertisement can be either pending, where only the course coordinator and submitting employer can view it, or published, where any student can see it as well. Each advertisement has a number of roles, an employer, and a status (as described above) associated with it.
    Author:
    TeamW

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Advertisement.AdvertisementStatus
      An advertisement status is initially pending (just after a company creates it).

    • Method Detail

      • getRoles

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Role> getRoles()
        An advertisement can have a number of job roles associated with it. This method returns every role and it's identifying integer in a map data structure for fast access.
        Returns:
        A Map with Integer/Role Key.Value pairs.

      • getEmployer

        Employer getEmployer()
        An advertisement has one employer associated with it. This method just returns the object representing the employer who submitted the advertisement.
        Returns:
        The Employer object that represents the company who submitted the advertisement.

      • getApplicationDetails

        java.lang.String getApplicationDetails()
        Each advertisement has a variable amount of employer-supplied details associated with it. This method just returns all of those details.
        Returns:
        String representing the details associated with the advertisement.

      • getComments

        java.lang.String getComments()
        A course coordinator may, at their choosing, add comments to an advertisement when reviewing it. If so, these will be made available with this method.
        Returns:
        String of comments by course coordinator or null if no comments available.

      • getStatus

        Advertisement.AdvertisementStatus getStatus()
        An advertisement status is initially pending (just after a company creates it). The course coordinator can then change the status to published, allowing any student to view it.
        Returns:
        The application's status.

      • PublishAd

        void PublishAd()
        A course coordinator will review the advertisement and, if suitable, will publish the advertisement. This method changes the status to published.

      • addNewRole

        Role addNewRole(java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String location,
              java.util.Date start,
              java.util.Date end,
              java.lang.String description,
              java.lang.Double salary)
        Each advertisement can have many roles (at least one) associated with it. This method will add a role to the advertisement.
        Parameters:
        title - The String representing the job title of the role.
        location - The String representing where the job will be based.
        start - The Date which the job will begin.
        end - The Date which the job will finish.
        description - The String representing the description of the role.
        salary - A Double representing the annual pay for the job.
        Returns:
        The Role object added if successful, null otherwise.
